title: API Key isn't listing my inventory

comments.author: xanthic.9478
comments.body:
Elusive.4729:

I’m using gw2crafts.net and my crafting mats in my inventory aren’t being shown in the already bought list. Am i doing something wrong or is there a problem with the site?

Which inventory? My API request only pulls from bank and storage.

“Clicking the button will update the quantities of all items in your bank and material storage that are used in this guide.”

comments.author: RAB.7682
comments.body:
You are welcome to try mine:

http://rab.rickbrodeur.com/gw2_personal_characters.html

or by the main site for menu and more options:

http://rab.rickbrodeur.com/

Any feedback appreciated.

comments.author: Illconceived Was Na.9781
comments.body:
According to the developer:

Clicking the button will update the quantities of all items in your bank and material storage that are used in this guide.

Regardless, I’d first report the bug to xanthics
https://github.com/xanthics/gw2craft/issues

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Assuming you’re talking about materials in character inventories; does requesting the data manually from the API work? If you get “https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/characters/CHAR-NAME/inventory?access_token=API-KEY”, does it show the inventory contents? If it does, it’s likely that the problem is on gw2crafts.net. I’m guessing that site only inspects your material storage.

comments.author: Elusive.4729
comments.body: I’m using gw2crafts.net and my crafting mats in my inventory aren’t being shown in the already bought list. Am i doing something wrong or is there a problem with the site?
